nodes.documentation:
@author Senapati Sang Diwangkara, from Affluent team
@title The Trst Token Contract
TrstToken is a contract for handling Trst transaction and redeeming logic. It also provides
the means to monitor and manipulate the token's total supply and value in the system, that
can only be done by an administrator account (root).
Among the 3 contracts, this contract must be deployed first, because the vault and staking
contract depended on it.
nodes.name: TrstToken
transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
@dev Redeem some token to ETH, will be sent to sender's address
@param _value The amount to be redeemed
nodes.name: redeem
mint
burn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set the Wei/mTrst price. Can only be called by root.
@param _price The new price
nodes.name: setPrice

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback function. Used to deposit ETH to the contract

@dev Withdraw ETH from the contract into root's account. Can only be called by root
@param _value Withdrawal amount
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set the vault contract's address. Can only be called once.
@param _address vault contract's address
nodes.name: setVaultContractAddr

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set the stake contract's address. Can only be called once
@param _address stake contract's address
nodes.name: setStakeContractAddr
_transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
@author Senapati Sang Diwangkara, from Affluent team
@title The Trst Token Contract
TrstToken is a contract for handling Trst transaction and redeeming logic. It also provides
the means to monitor and manipulate the token's total supply and value in the system, that
can only be done by an administrator account (root).
Among the 3 contracts, this contract must be deployed first, because the vault and staking
contract depended on it.
nodes.name: TrstToken
transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
@dev Redeem some token to ETH, will be sent to sender's address
@param _value The amount to be redeemed
nodes.name: redeem
mint
burn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set the Wei/mTrst price. Can only be called by root.
@param _price The new price
nodes.name: setPrice

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback function. Used to deposit ETH to the contract

@dev Withdraw ETH from the contract into root's account. Can only be called by root
@param _value Withdrawal amount
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set the vault contract's address. Can only be called once.
@param _address vault contract's address
nodes.name: setVaultContractAddr

nodes.documentation:

_transferFrom

devdoc.author: Senapati Sang Diwangkara, from Affluent team

burn(address,uint256).details: Purge token into the void. Can only be called by root.

mint(address,uint256).details: Create token out of thin air. Can only be called by root.

redeem(uint256).details: Redeem some token to ETH, will be sent to sender's address

setPrice(uint256).details: Set the Wei/mTrst price. Can only be called by root.

setStakeContractAddr(address).details: Set the stake contract's address. Can only be called once

setVaultContractAddr(address).details: Set the vault contract's address. Can only be called once.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer some tokens from an account to another. Can only be done by another Clint	contract or root

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw ETH from the contract into root's account. Can only be called by root

devdoc.title: The Trst Token Contract TrstToken is a contract for handling Trst transaction and redeeming logic. It also provides the means to monitor and manipulate the token's total supply and value in the system, that can only be done by an administrator account (root). Among the 3 contracts, this contract must be deployed first, because the vault and staking contract depended on it.
